subject: A Heart For God's Word
text:
My heart beats for the living Word of God.
 My heart skips for His love.
 Oh! He loves me and I love him
 He died for me.
 Through His blood I am free.
 I have received the Word of God.
 It is mine.
 No one can take from me what God gave freely.
 The word is enlarged in my heart.
 By faith I have received it.
 The Word in is -Jesus!
